Source: hikeErrorUtils.js

import { NativeModules } from 'react-native';

const HikeErrorUtilsModule = NativeModules.HikeErrorUtilsModule;

export default class HikeErrorUtils {
  /**
   * Set metadata object that would be attached to each exception being reported.
   * @param {object} [metadata] Metadata to be attached with each exception
   */
  static setExceptionMetadata(metadata = {}) {
    HikeErrorUtilsModule.setExceptionMetadata(metadata);
  }

  /**
   * Log exception manually to Hike's exception handler and reporting
   * @param {object} exception Exception JSON which could contain stuff like error message, line number, column number and stack trace.
   */
  static logException(exception) {
    HikeErrorUtilsModule.logException(exception);
  }
}
